00194     class SpanIterator
00195     {
00196 
00197       friend class ImageContainerBySTLVector<Domain, ValueType>;
00198 
00199     public:
00200 
00201       typedef std::bidirectional_iterator_tag iterator_category; 
00202       typedef ValueType value_type;
00203       typedef ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00204       typedef ValueType* pointer;
00205       typedef ValueType& reference;
00206 
00214       SpanIterator( const Point & p ,
00215                     const Dimension aDim ,
00216                     ImageContainerBySTLVector<Domain, ValueType> *aMap ) :  myMap ( aMap ), myDimension ( aDim )
00217       {
00218         myPos = aMap->linearized(p);
00219 
00220         //We compute the myShift quantity
00221         myShift = 1;
00222         for (unsigned int k = 0; k < myDimension  ; k++)
00223           myShift *= (aMap->myUpperBound.at(k) - aMap->myLowerBound.at(k));
00224       }
00225 
00226 
00232       const ValueType & operator*() const
00233       {
00234         return (*myMap)[ myPos ];
00235       }
00236 
00242       bool operator== ( const SpanIterator &it ) const
00243       {
00244         return ( myPos == it.myPos );
00245       }
00246 
00252       bool operator!= ( const SpanIterator &it ) const
00253       {
00254         return ( myPos != it.myPos );
00255 
00256       }
00257 
00262       void next()
00263       {
00264         myPos += myShift;
00265       }
00266 
00271       void prev()
00272       {
00273         ASSERT((long int) myPos - myShift > 0);
00274         myPos -= myShift;
00275       }
00276 
00281       SpanIterator &operator++()
00282       {
00283         this->next();
00284         return *this;
00285       }
00286 
00291       SpanIterator &operator++ ( int )
00292       {
00293         SpanIterator tmp = *this;
00294         ++*this;
00295         return tmp;
00296       }
00297 
00302       SpanIterator &operator--()
00303       {
00304         this->prev();
00305         return *this;
00306       }
00307 
00312       SpanIterator &operator-- ( int )
00313       {
00314         SpanIterator tmp = *this;
00315         --*this;
00316         return tmp;
00317       }
00318

00328 
00330       Size myShift;

00332     };

00355     SpanIterator spanBegin(const Point &aPoint, const Dimension aDimension)
00356     {
00357       return SpanIterator ( aPoint, aDimension, this);
00358     }
00359 
00370     SpanIterator spanEnd(const Point &aPoint, const Dimension aDimension)
00371     {
00372       Point tmp = aPoint;
00373       tmp.at( aDimension ) = myLowerBound.at( aDimension ) +
00374         myUpperBound.at( aDimension ) -
00375         myLowerBound.at( aDimension ) + 1;
00376       return SpanIterator( tmp, aDimension, this);
00377     }
